May 19, 2024 - Pottery in the Belleek region began around 1849, after John Caldwell Bloomfield inherited his father's estate. Seeking to provide employment for his tenants, who had been affected by the Great Famine, and being an amateur mineralogist, he ordered a geological survey of his land.

s: October 9, 2019 - Belleek china is coveted by collectors, thanks to its brilliant beauty and fascinating legacy, tracing back to one of the darkest moments in Irish history.
